events.message: I received my order yesterday but unfortunately one of the items arrived broken with visible scratches all over it.
The reported issue has been categorised under Product Defect due to the customer's claim about broken and scratched items.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the case regarding the defective product received by the customer.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your order. I’m here to assist you in resolving this problem as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged item and confirm your order number so we can verify and process your request promptly?
I have attached several photos showing the scratches and broken parts, and my order number is 45872. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement item shipped at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option you would like.
I would prefer the replacement item if it can be sent as soon as possible. Thank you for the prompt help.
Your replacement request has been processed, and the new item will be shipped within 2 business days. We apologize again for the inconvenience caused.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement item and that it arrived in perfect condition. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
The case has been closed after successful delivery of the replacement product and confirmation from the customer.
